event.description: Chris Getz strikes out swinging.
Jayson Nix grounds out, third baseman Mark Teahen to first baseman Billy Butler.
Carlos Quentin pops out to shortstop Mike Aviles.
Jim Thome flies out to center fielder Coco Crisp.
Paul Konerko strikes out swinging.
A. J. Pierzynski strikes out swinging.
Alexei Ramirez strikes out swinging.
Scott Podsednik singles on a line drive to center fielder Coco Crisp, deflected by second baseman Alberto Callaspo.
With Brent Lillibridge batting, Scott Podsednik caught stealing 2nd base, catcher Miguel Olivo to second baseman Alberto Callaspo.
Brent Lillibridge pops out to first baseman Billy Butler in foul territory.
Chris Getz grounds out, first baseman Billy Butler to pitcher Zack Greinke.
Jayson Nix strikes out swinging.
Carlos Quentin strikes out swinging.
Jim Thome strikes out swinging.
Paul Konerko flies out to center fielder Coco Crisp.
A. J. Pierzynski singles on a pop up to second baseman Alberto Callaspo.
Alexei Ramirez grounds out, third baseman Mark Teahen to first baseman Billy Butler.
Scott Podsednik doubles (1) on a sharp ground ball to right fielder Jose Guillen, deflected by first baseman Billy Butler.
Brent Lillibridge strikes out swinging.
Chris Getz flies out to right fielder Jose Guillen.
Jayson Nix grounds out, first baseman Billy Butler to pitcher Zack Greinke.
Carlos Quentin grounds out, shortstop Mike Aviles to first baseman Billy Butler.
Jim Thome strikes out swinging.
Paul Konerko flies out to center fielder Coco Crisp.
Mitch Maier remains in the game as the right fielder.
A. J. Pierzynski singles on a line drive to left fielder David DeJesus, deflected by third baseman Mark Teahen.
Alexei Ramirez singles on a soft fly ball to center fielder Coco Crisp. A. J. Pierzynski to 2nd.
Scott Podsednik grounds into a double play, shortstop Mike Aviles to second baseman Alberto Callaspo to first baseman Billy Butler. J. Pierzynski to 3rd. Alexei Ramirez out at 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Wilson Betemit replaces Brent Lillibridge.
Wilson Betemit strikes out swinging.
Chris Getz grounds out, second baseman Alberto Callaspo to first baseman Billy Butler.
Jayson Nix doubles (1) on a fly ball to left fielder David DeJesus.
Carlos Quentin flies out to left fielder David DeJesus.
With Jim Thome batting, Jayson Nix advances to 3rd on defensive indifference.
Jim Thome pops out to third baseman Mark Teahen.
Coco Crisp grounds out to first baseman Paul Konerko.
David DeJesus flies out to left fielder Carlos Quentin in foul territory.
Mark Teahen called out on strikes.
Jose Guillen singles on a ground ball to center fielder Brent Lillibridge.
Billy Butler called out on strikes.
Mike Jacobs singles on a ground ball to right fielder Scott Podsednik. Jose Guillen to 2nd.
Alberto Callaspo singles on a line drive to right fielder Scott Podsednik. Jose Guillen scores. Mike Jacobs to 3rd. Fielding error by right fielder Scott Podsednik.

Mike Aviles called out on strikes.
Coco Crisp strikes out swinging.
David DeJesus homers (3) on a line drive to right field.

Billy Butler singles on a ground ball to center fielder Brent Lillibridge. Mark Teahen scores.
Mike Jacobs doubles (6) on a line drive to right fielder Scott Podsednik. Billy Butler to 3rd.
Bartolo Colon intentionally walks Alberto Callaspo.
Miguel Olivo called out on strikes.

Jose Guillen walks.
Billy Butler grounds out, third baseman Jayson Nix to first baseman Paul Konerko. Jose Guillen to 2nd.
Mike Jacobs walks.

Pitching Change: Clayton Richard replaces Bartolo Colon.
Miguel Olivo singles on a ground ball to center fielder Brent Lillibridge.
Mike Aviles flies out to left fielder Carlos Quentin.
With Coco Crisp batting, Miguel Olivo picked off and caught stealing 2nd base, pitcher Clayton Richard to first baseman Paul Konerko to second baseman Chris Getz.

Defensive switch from right field to center field for Scott Podsednik.
Wilson Betemit remains in the game as the third baseman.
